price: 88. And eat of the things which Allâh has provided for you, lawful and good, and fear Allâh in Whom you believe.
arabic: وَكُلُواْ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ حَلَٰلٗا طَيِّبٗاۚ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنتُم بِهِۦ مُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: wakulū mimmā razaqakumu al-lahu ḥalālan ṭayyiban wa-ittaqū al-laha alladhī antum bihi mu'minūna
